channel.title: CVE Feed for Atlas Public Policy -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Atlas Public Policy -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-37959|2024-08-02T04:04:24.661Z -- atlas%20public%20policy -- power%20bi%20embedded%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Atlas Public Policy Power BI Embedded for WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Power BI Embedded for WordPress: from n/a through 1.1.7.
